title: Osteoarticular infections
text:

Further reading

Podcasts on topics related to osteoarticuliar infections
The Socieity of Infectious Diseases Pharmacists (SIDP) has excellent podcasts on topics related to managing bone and joint infections with many physician experts: 
Antibiofilm approaches
Rifampin dosing in osteo
Prosthetic joint infections
